input_args.passage: "Serena Williams | Serena won four Olympic gold medals, three in women's doubles—an all-time ... 23 in singles, 14 in women's doubles, and two in mixed doubles. She is joint ..."
input_args.claim: 'Therefore, Serena Williams is considered more accomplished because she won more Grand Slam titles in both singles and doubles, and more Olympic gold medals than Mariaan de Swardt.'
